comment.author: 26220432@N06
comment._content:
** translation of describtion **

Repatriates. Young displaced children are sitting at a seperate table in a schoolclass in Amsterdam Slotermeer. The boys and girls are playing with, amongst other things, buildingblocks and jigsaws. Holland, Amsterdam, 1956.

comment.author: 22337748@N02
comment._content: Hola, soy el administrador de un grupo llamado MOMENTS COMPARTITS y nos encantaría agregar esto al grupo.
